Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image shows a young girl who was a patient at a Moscow oncology center, not the Russian President's daughter receiving the COVID-19 vaccine.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the image by falsely attributing it to the Russian President's daughter receiving the vaccine.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible source provided to verify the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image shows the Russian President's daughter receiving the COVID-19 vaccine without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image shows a young girl who was a patient at a Moscow oncology center, not the Russian President's daughter receiving the vaccine.
